Colors

Main and secondary colors

On the top left in the Action bar (top bar), there are two colored circles : one big and one small. They are respectively the main and the secondary color. If you click on the secondary color, it will become the main one and the previous main the secondary.

Go to the color user interface

You can either go to the color user interface by clicking on the main color circle or on Colors in the menu.

Hue noise

If hue noise is enabled, your stroke will not use the main and secondary color but colors with the same saturation and brightness but a different hue. The hue is chosen randomly. The slide bar under the hue noise check box parameterize how far the random hue can differ from the original hue.

Palette

Drawchemy records the last eight different colors used on the canvas and allows you to re-use them.

Pipette

Click on the pipette button and next on the canvas, you will see the main color changes accordingly to your finger position.
